mapper.insert: insert into board(b_tno, btitle, bcontent, bname) values (#{b_tno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bname})
mapper.select:
select b.btitle, b.bcontent, m.bname as writer_name from board b inner join member m on m.name=b.bname
where b.btitle like concat('%', #{value},'%') or b.bcontent like concat('%', #{value},'%') or m.bname like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by b.bno desc
select b.bno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bdate, b.bcount, b.b_tno, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name from board b inner join member m on m.no=b.bname where b.no = #{value}
